SA15bsa069_u:2_1: yadi bhavadvacanamanyāyyaṃ, tadāsmadvacanaṃ nyāyyam / yadi [bhavatocyate] bhavadvacanaṃ nyāyyaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:3_2: kuta iti cet / yadanyāyyaṃ tannirābhāsam / vacanaṃ nyāyābhāvādbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā ? /
SA15bsa069_u:3_3: abhinnaṃ cedvacanamapi nāstīti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti bhavatā kathamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:3_4: atha bhinnaṃ, tato vacanaṃ nyāyyamiti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti kathaṃ bhavatocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:3_7: yathā gośṛṅge 'śvakarṇau vā parasparaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ na śaknuvataḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:3_8: samakālīnatvāt / asamakālīnañced, bhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ pūrvamasmadvacanaṃ paścāt /
SA15bsa069_u:3_9: athāsmadvacanānuccāraṇāt, kiṃ bhavatā khaṇḍyate? / tasmādbhavataḥ khaṇḍanamasidvam /
SA15bsa069_u:3_13: samakālīnañcet, tato 'smadvacanaṃ bhavataśca khaṇḍanamityetayoretat khaṇḍanametacca khaṇḍanīyamiti viśeṣo na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:4_0: aparañca / bhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ svakhaṇḍanārthamasvakhaṇḍanārthaṃ vā? svakhaṇḍanārthañcet,
SA15bsa069_u:4_2: asvakhaṇḍanārthañced, asiddham / kuta iti cet, svārthataḥ khaṇḍanāsidveḥ / siddhañcet, svārthahāniḥ parārthasidviśca /
SA15bsa069_u:5_1: vacanameva na bhavet / vacanañcennaivānyāyyam / anyāyyamiti cet, tadvirudvam / yathā kumārī putravatīti / yato yadi kumārī putravatīti na sampadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:5_2: yadi putravatī, tarhi naiva kumārī / kumārīti putravatīti cobhayaṃ virudvam /
SA15bsa069_u:5_8: yathā kaścinmanyeta śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyānupalabdhiratha śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyopalabdhiḥ pratyakṣasidveti,
SA15bsa069_u:6_0: anumānaviruddhaṃ caitat / mama vacanamanumānenopalabhyate cettato nyāyyamiti spaṣṭam /
SA15bsa069_u:6_4: yacca hetumattadanityaṃ, [Tś_5] yathā ghaṭaḥ / sa hetumattvādanityaḥ / yadi hetumāṃstadānityaḥ śabdo,
SA15bsa069_u:6_5: yadi nityo naiva hetumān / ityanityatānumānasidvā / anumānabalānnityatahāniḥ / nyāyyamiti, yadvacanaṃ tannyāyyam / yannyāyyamityanumānasiddhaṃ, tadanyāyyamiti pratiṣidvam / lokavirudvaṃ caitat / yadbhavatoktaṃ mama vacanamanyāyyamiti tallokavirudvam /
SA15bsa069_u:8_0: sāpekṣanyāyaḥ / yathā dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ, pitā putraḥ / sādhananyāyaḥ / yathā pañcāvayavavākyaṃ sādhanārtham /
SA15bsa069_u:8_2: iha loke vacanaṃ phalaṃ, nyāyo heturiti / iha loke yadā phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadā sahetukaṃ jñātam /
SA15bsa069_u:8_3: yadā vacanamupalabdhaṃ, tadā nyāyyaṃ jñātam / yanmama vacanamanyāyyamiti bhavatoktaṃ tallokavirudvam /
SA15bsa069_u:9_0: yad bhavatoktaṃ mama vacanamanyahisaṃvāditvāditi tadidamidānīṃ bhavatā sārdhaṃ vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:9_3: atha tadbhavataḥ svoktam / tadānyaduktam / tasmādbhavāneva doṣamāpadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:9_4: yadi bhavadartho 'smaduktādanyastadānyatvadoṣo bhavata eva na tu mama /
SA15bsa069_u:9_5: yadi nānyat, tarhi matpakṣatulyameva, tena nāstyanyatvam / athocyate mamānyaditi tanmithyā /
SA15bsa069_u:9_8: tato 'nyanna bhavet / yathā manuṣyo goranyo na gaurbhavati,
SA15bsa069_u:9_9: yadyanyadanyasmādanyat, tadā tadekaṃ bhavet / yadyekaṃ tato nānyat, tatkimucyate mamānyaditi / ataścaitanyāyyamiti / ahaṃ nyāyamavalambya bhavatā vivade /
SA15bsa069_u:9_10: tasmādanyathāhaṃ vadāmi / yadyāvayorbheda eva na syānna tadā bhavatā vivādo 'haṃ tu bhavadarthameva vadāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:10_0: sarvamuktamanyaditi ced, bhavatāpi kiñciduktamiti bhavānapyanyadvadatīti doṣo bhavata eva /
SA15bsa069_u:10_1: yadi bhavato vākyaṃ nānyat, tarhi mamāpi vacanaṃ nānyaditi yad bhavatoktamahamanyadvadāmīti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:10_3: śeṣaṃ pūrvavat / yad (bhavato)ktaṃ mama vacanamasiddhamiti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:10_5: yadi vacanasyāsiddhatvaṃ, tadā vacanameva na prāptam / atha vacanaṃ na prāptaṃ, kathaṃ bhavatocyate mayā yaduktaṃ tadasiddhamiti /
SA15bsa069_u:10_8: yadi sarvaṃ vacanamasiddha, tarhi bhavaduktaṃ mama khaṇdanamapyasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:10_14: tadāsiddhaṃ na syāt / yadi siddhaṃ, nāstyasiddhaṃ, tato yad (bhavato)ktaṃ maduktamasiddhamiti tanniravakāśam /
SA15bsa069_u:10_15: yadi bhavatocyate mama khaṇḍanamananubhāṣaṇameva tadā na mama matasyopalabdhi /
SA15bsa069_u:10_17: tato mama khaṇḍanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:10_20: tadā bhavān khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknoti /
SA15bsa069_u:10_21: kiṃ punarmanyate bhavān khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ śakyaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:10_28: tadā khaṇḍanānavasthā / na ca sa kālo vidyate yatra na khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam /
SA15bsa069_u:10_29: [ataḥ] yatra khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate sa kālo nāsti /
SA15bsa069_u:11_2: ananubhāṣya tu khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ ja śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:11_8: ananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti ced,
SA15bsa069_u:11_9: ananubhāṣyāpi tataḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa069_u:11_10: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanam nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:11_11: dvitīyamapi khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:11_12: dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ śakyata iti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:11_13: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ [Tś_8] nāmāpyananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyeta /
SA15bsa069_u:11_17: tadā khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuaṃ śakyate natvananubhāṣya vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:11_26: tadāhamanubhāṣe / yadā tvahaṃ bhavanmataṃ khaṇḍayāmi tadā bhavānapyanubhāṣate /
SA15bsa069_u:11_28: yadi parasparānubhāṣaṇaṃ, tadā samyagarthahāniḥ / yathā potāvanyonyasambadvau samudravelāsamaye parasparasaṃgharṣeṇa dolāyamānau /
SA15bsa069_u:12_0: aparañca / sarve śabdā yadā mukhānnirgatāstadā naṣṭā eveti kathaṃ madvacanānubhāṣaṇam? /
SA15bsa069_u:12_3: nityatvāt / naṣṭa iti cen, na kiñcidanubhāṣitavyaṃ tadabhāvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:12_4: śabdo naṣṭa iti cet, tvadanubhāṣaṇāyaitanme vacanamiti yadbhavān bravīti sa kutarka eva /
SA15bsa069_u:13_1: [bhavata] khaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāditi tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:13_2: yadi madvacanaṃ pūrvaṃ, khaṇḍanantu paścāditi tanyāyyam /
SA15bsa069_u:13_3: kuta iti [Tś_9] cen, madvacanaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavadvacanaṃ tu paścāditi /
SA15bsa069_u:13_6: kiñca yadyucyate bhavatā sarvāṇi vacanāni pūrvavartīni khaṇḍanantu paravartīti,
SA15bsa069_u:13_7: tadā bhavānapi pūrvameva vacanaṃ vadatīti paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:13_10: paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ na syāt / yacca khaṇḍanaṃ pūrvasya paravartīti svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścādasti /
SA15bsa069_u:13_11: yadi svabhāvata eva pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ paścāt syāt,
SA15bsa069_u:13_14: yadi svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścāt /
SA15bsa069_u:13_15: hetvabhāvāt / tadā pūrvasyāpi khaṇḍanaṃ parabhāvi na bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:14_0: yadabhihitaṃ bhavatā, mayā hetvantaramuktamiti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:14_3: kathamiti ced, bhavatā pūrvahetuṃ parityajya hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanāt /
SA15bsa069_u:14_4: yadi hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanādbhavato na nigrahasthānatvāpattistadā mamāpi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:14_7: yadyanyaṃ hetuṃ na vadeyaṃ, tato bhavaddhetuṃ vadeyam / tato na pratipakṣatayā virodho 'pi tvāvayostulyavacanataiva /
SA15bsa069_u:15_1: api ca yadi sarvāṇi vacanāni hetvantarāṇi syustadābhavaduktāni vacanānyapi hetvantarāṇi bhaveyuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:15_3: atha vacanānyuccārayannapi na bhavān nigrāhyastarhi yadbhavatoktaṃ hetuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayannahaṃ nigrāhya iti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:16_0: yadbhavatoktamarthāntaraṃ vadāmīti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicāryaṃ nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:16_1: anyā me pratijñā, anyā ca bhavata iti yattannyāyyameva /
SA15bsa069_u:16_3: yadi matamasmadartho bhavadarthādananyastadāsmadartho bhavadarthapratipakṣatayā na virudvo /
SA15bsa069_u:16_8: na tadārthāntaram / tasmādyadbhavatoktamahamarthāntaraṃ vadāmīti na yuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:16_9: aparañca yaduktaṃ sarvaṃ tadarthāntarañcettadā bhavaduktamapyarthāntaraṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:16_10: yadi bhavaduktamarthāntaraṃ na bhavettadā yadbhavatā pratijñātaṃ sarvamarthāntaramiti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:17_0: yad (bhavato)ktamahaṃ pūrvacanādananyadvacanaṃ vadāmīti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:17_3: tannyāyyam / kuta iti cet / sarvatrāhaṃ bhavadarthakhaṇḍanārthaṃ vadāmi,
SA15bsa069_u:18_0: anyacca / yathā mayā pūrvamuktamanityaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:18_3: tataśca yadbhavatoktaṃ bhavān pūrvavacanaṃ vadatīti tanmithyā /
SA15bsa069_u:19_5: yacca (bhavato)ktaṃ mayā sarvamuktaṃ nānujñāyata iti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:19_6: sarvaṃ nānujñāyata iti yaduktaṃ bhavatā etadvacanaṃ sarvasminnantarbhavati na vā? /
SA15bsa069_u:19_7: yadi tāvatsarvasminnantarbhavati tadā bhavān svayaṃ svoktaṃ nānujānāti /
SA15bsa069_u:19_8: yadi svayaṃ nānujānātyasmadarthaḥ svata eva siddho bhavedbhavavacanasya tu hāniḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:19_9: atha sarvasminnāntarbhavati tadā tasya sarvatvameva na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:19_10: yadi sarvatvameva na bhavet, tadā bhavatā yadananujñātaṃ tatsarvam /
SA15bsa069_u:23_0: [tatra] viparītakhaṇḍanam / yadi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ samyagarthena na saṃyuktaṃ syāttadā tadviparītakhaṇḍanamityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:23_2: (1)sādharmyakhaṇḍanam (2) vaidharmyakhaṇḍanam (3) vikalpakhaṇḍanam (4) aviśeṣakhaṇḍanam (5) prāptyaprāptikhaṇḍanam (6) ahetukhaṇḍanam(7) upalabdhikhaṇḍanam (8) saṃśayakhaṇḍanam (9) anuktikhaṇḍanam (10) kāryabhedakhaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:25_1: utpannaśca vinaṣṭaḥ / śabdo 'pi tatheti śabdo 'nitya iti sthāpite prativādī prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:26_1: yannityaṃ na tatprayatnenotpannaṃ yathākāśaṃ nityaṃ na prayatnenotpannam /
SA15bsa069_u:26_2: śabdastu na tathā / tasmācchabdo 'nitya iti sthāpite prativādī prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:26_4: tadā kiṃ prāptam? / yadyākāśasādharmyaṃ [Tś_13] tato nitya eva śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:27_1: kuta iti cet / aikāntikaikarasadharmasthāpanaṃ hi heturiti manyate /
SA15bsa069_u:28_0: prativādī tvanaikāntikaikarasārthapratyavasthānena khaṇḍanaṃ bhāṣate yathā yadi bhavān sādharmyeṇa śabdasyānityatāṃ sthāpayati tadāhamapi vaidharmyeṇa śabdasya nityatāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:28_1: yadi ca bhavadarthaḥ siddho mamāpyarthaḥ siddho bhavediti /
SA15bsa069_u:29_6: yadi bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpito heturasmaddhetutulyobhavettadā samyakkhaṇḍanaṃ sidhyeta /
SA15bsa069_u:29_8: kuta iti cet / nityatāsthāpakahetunānityatāsthāpakahetuḥ khaṇḍyate cet,
SA15bsa069_u:29_9: tadānityatāviparyāsadoṣo vyaktīkartuṃ na śakyata iti prasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:31_0: (śāstramāha) anityaḥ śabdaḥ / kasmāt? kṛtakatvāt / yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam / yathākāśaṃ nityamakṛtakatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:32_0: prativādī prāha / yadi śabdo nityākāśavidharmyādanitya iti,
SA15bsa069_u:32_1: tadā kiṃ prāptam / yadi ghaṭavaidharmyaṃ śabdasya,
SA15bsa069_u:32_2: tadā sa nitya iti / tadvaidharmyamamūrtatvam / ghaṭo mūrtastasmādghaṭo 'nityaḥ śabdastu nityaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:33_0: (śāstramāha) śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt / yathā ghaṭo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt, tathā śabdo 'pi /
SA15bsa069_u:34_0: prativādī prāha / yadi ghaṭasādharmyācchabdasyānityatā bhavatā sthāpitā,
SA15bsa069_u:34_1: tadā kiṃ prāptam? / śabdo nitya eva ghaṭavaidharmyādvaidharmyamamūrtatvam /
SA15bsa069_u:35_4: yo 'smābhiḥ sthāpito hetuḥ kṛtakatvācchabdo 'nitya iti tasya (hetoḥ) pakṣadharmmaḥ sapakṣasattvaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttiśca /
SA15bsa069_u:35_6: yaḥ punarbhavatpratiṣṭhāpito hetuḥ śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāditi tasya pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartata ityasiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:38_1: asti punastadvaidharmyam / pakkatvamapakvatvaṃ, cākṣuṣatvamacākṣuṣatvamityādi evaṃ ghaṭaśabdayoḥ pratyekaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:39_0: viparītametatkhaṇḍanam / kuta iti cet / asmatsthāpitaheturanityatāvyāvṛtto nityatāvyāvṛttaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:40_1: tataśca nitya iti / tadecchādveṣaduḥkhasukhavāyvādīnyapakvāni na punaretāni nityāni /
SA15bsa069_u:40_4: kuta iti cet / icchadveṣaduḥkhasukhavāyvādīnyacākṣuṣāṇi na punarnityāni /
SA15bsa069_u:40_5: bhavaddhetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartate tasmādasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:40_6: bhavaddheturmama (heto) stulyo matpratijñāyāśca khaṇḍanāsamartha iti cet /
SA15bsa069_u:40_8: yadatulyaṃ tulyamiti bhavatoktaṃ tasmādbhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ viparītam /
SA15bsa069_u:42_3: iti sthāpite / prativādī prāha yadi sādharmyādyathā ghaṭādyanityaṃ śabdo 'pi tathā syāttadā sarvasya sarveṇāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:42_4: kuta iti cet / sarvasya sarveṇa sādharmyāt /
SA15bsa069_u:42_5: sādharmyaṃ kiṃ punaścet / sattaikatvaṃ prameyatvamityetat sādharmyamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:42_6: sadharmāṇyapi sarvāṇi vastūni viśeṣṭavastubhyo bhinnānīti cecchabdo 'pi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:43_1: sarveṣāṃ na mayā sattvādisādharmyaṃ pratiṣidvamapi tu teṣāṃ viśeṣa evāvadhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:43_3: taccāsmābhiranityatāsādhanāyocyate na tu sādharmyamātramupādīyate na khalvasti sā kāpi yuktiryā naivaṃ vicāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:43_4: kasmāditi cet / naikamapi vidyate tādṛśaṃ yadanyavastuno na sadṛśaṃ na ca viśiṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:43_7: siddho hetureṣa / sādharmyamātreṇa hetupratiṣṭhāpanaṃ tvasiddhaṃ tasmādviparītam /
SA15bsa069_u:45_0: prativādī prāha / hetuḥ pratijñā cābhāvānna bhidyete /
SA15bsa069_u:46_0: viparītametatkhaṇḍanam / kuta iti cet / asmatpratijñāyā abhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvātmakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:47_0: yadi siddhā pratijñopādīyate 'siddhastu heturbhavataḥ khaṇḍanasya viparyāso 'dhikataro bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:47_1: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ pūrvamabhūtvā paścādabhāva iti mayoktam /
SA15bsa069_u:47_4: yadi pūrvaṃ śabdaḥ sanneva na cāsti pratibandhastadā kasmācchrotreṇa nopalabhyate /
SA15bsa069_u:47_7: iṣṭasādhanaṃ ca na yuktisampannaṃ so 'rtho nirasanīyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:48_0: 5. prāptyaprāptikhaṇḍanam / hetuḥ sādhyaṃ prāpnoti na vā? /
SA15bsa069_u:48_2: atha hetuḥ sādhyaṃ na prāpnoti tadāpyasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:49_0: prativādī prāha / yadi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ prāpnoti tadā sādhyena saṃsargātsādhyaṃ na sādhayati /
SA15bsa069_u:49_3: tadā heturaprāpakaḥ / yadi prāpakastadā kiṃ siddhasyārthasya hetunā /
SA15bsa069_u:49_4: tasmāddheturasiddhaḥ / atha na prāpnoti tadā so 'nyavastuvadasādhakaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:50_1: yadi bhavataḥ khaṇḍanamutpattihetusamāśritaṃ tadā siddhaṃ khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:50_3: kasmāditi cet / uktaṃ mayā yaddhetuḥ sādhyaṃ notpādayatyapi tu parapratipādanārthaṃ sādhyaṃ vyanaktyavyāvṛttatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:50_5: kuta iti cet / mohāt / tasmād vyañjanaheturityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:50_6: yathā rūpasattve 'pi pradīpaprayojanaṃ tadvyañjanārthaṃ na tu tadutpattyartham /

SA15bsa069_u:53_0: viparītametatkhaṇḍanam / kuta iti cet / yatpūrvaṃ samutpannaṃ [Tś_19] tadeva hetunā vyajyate yathā dīpaḥ vidyamānānyeva vastūni vyanakti na tvavidyamānāni vastūnyutpādayati /

SA15bsa069_u:56_0: prativādī prāha / yadi prayatna[ānantarīyaka]tvācchabdo 'nityastadā yatra prayatno na vidyate tatra nityatāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:56_1: yathā vidyudvāyvādīnyaprayatna [ānantarīyaka]āṇyanityeṣu cāntarbhūtāni tasmādanityatve sādhye na prayatnamātraṃ samāśrayaṇīyaṃ prayatnasyāsādhanatvāt /

SA15bsa069_u:56_11: tatrāha khaṇḍayitā / tarūṇāṃ divyacetanāsiddhā / kasmāt? hetorvyāptyabhāvāt / śirīṣa eva svapiti na tvapare taravaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:56_12: sa svapno na sarvāṃstarūn vyāpnoti tasmātsarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ divyacetanatvapratiṣṭhāpane svapno 'samarthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:57_0: viparītametatkhaṇḍanam / mayaivaṃ noktam / naitaducyate mayā yatprayatnaḥ sarvānityatākhyāpane samartho heturanye tu hetavo 'samarthāḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:57_4: tasmātpratijñā siddhā / yathā dhūmenāgniranumitaḥ / yadi kaścidvadetprabhayāgnirapi siddho 'smadarthe 'pi tathāsambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:57_8: asmanmatākhaṇḍanāt / yadyahaṃ bravīmi yadyadanityaṃ tattatsarvaṃ prayatnasamutpannamiti tadā prayatnotpattihetoravyāpitvādasiddhatvamiti bhavatā khaṇḍanaṃ vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:57_10: yadāhaṃ bravīmi śabdābikamanityaṃ prayatnasamutpannatvāttadā yatsarvamanityaṃ [Tś_21] tatprayatnasamutpannamiti nocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:59_3: yatsamutpannaṃ tatprayatena vyaktaṃ yathā mūlakīlakodakaṃ prayatnena vyaktaṃ na tu prayatnena samutpannam /

SA15bsa069_u:60_14: kuta iti cet / bhāvābhāvāt / andhakāravat / andhakāre jyotiṣo 'bhāvaḥ tasmādandhakāraḥ /

SA15bsa069_u:62_0: pratijñā pūrvavat / prativādī prāha / prayatna iti vacanaṃ śabdasyānityatāheturiti cettadā kiṃ prāpyate? [Tś_23] prayatna ityanukte tadā śabdo nityaḥ /

SA15bsa069_u:70_1: kuta iti cet / nāsmābhiranityateṣṭā pratītā vā /

SA15bsa069_u:103_0: samyakkhaṇḍanaṃ pañcavidham / iṣṭārthadūṣaṇam, aniṣṭārthavyaktiḥ, prasaṅgavyaktiḥ, viṣamārthavyaktiḥ, marvānyāyasiddhilābhavyaktiḥ /

SA15bsa069_u:106_1: sa tu sanniti tadā dvitīyo mūrdhaviśeṣyo 'pi sanneva bhavet /

SA15bsa069_u:107_2: tadāhamapi nyāyāsamaśrayātsanneva dvitīyo mūrdhā na tvātmeti cedvadeyameṣo 'rthaḥ sidvo bhavet /

SA15bsa069_u:108_0: anyacca / ātmā dvitīya iva mūrdhāviśeṣyaḥ na tvasanniti cettadā vaiṣamyadoṣo bhavanmūrdhyāpatet /

SA15bsa069_u:108_6: śītolo 'gniḥ, grāhyoḥ vāyurityādi mūrkhavacanāninyāyāsamāśritānyapi bhavatsādhyavat siddhāni bhaveyuḥ /

SA15bsa069_u:127_2: śabdo nityaḥ kasmāt / anityasya nityatvāt / iyamavijñātārthanigrahasthānāpattirucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:128_1: yathā kaścidvadet / daśavidhaṃ phalaṃ trividhaḥ kaṃbala ekavidhaṃ pānabhojanametadapārthakamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:130_0: nityaḥ śabdaḥ / yathā pārimāṇḍalyāśrayasya paramāṇornityatvātpārimāṇḍalyaṃ nityaṃ śabdasyāpi tathātvasambhava iti kṛte 'paraḥ prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:131_0: atrāparaḥ / yathā gṛhe dagdhe tatparitrāṇāyodakānveṣaṇaṃ tathānavasare 'rtharakṣaṇāya hetusthāpanam /
SA15bsa069_u:132_0: 11. nyūnam / pañcāvayavā anyatamena hīnā iti nyūnam /
SA15bsa069_u:133_3: yadvastu kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtako 'nityaśceti tṛtīyo 'vayavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:135_2: atha sādhanasamarthastadā kiṃ hetubāhulyena udāharaṇabahulye 'pi tathātvasambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:136_0: 13. punaruktam / punaruktaṃ trividhaṃ, śabdapunaruktaṃ, artha punaruktaṃ, arthāpattipunaruktañca / śabdapunaruktaṃ yathā (kaścidvade) cchakraḥ śakraḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:136_2: arthāpattipunaruktaṃ yathā (kaścidvadet) satyaṃ saṃsāro duḥkhaṃ satyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sukham /
SA15bsa069_u:136_7: yadi na kiñcit prakaṭayitavyaṃ tadā tadaprayojanam /
SA15bsa069_u:137_0: 14. ananubhāṣaṇam / pariṣadā vijñātāyāḥ pratijñāyāstrirabhihitāyā [Tś_39] api yadi kaścitpratyuccāraṇāsamarthastadānanubhāṣaṇam /
SA15bsa069_u:138_0: 15. ajñānam / pariṣadā vijñātāyā api pratijñāyāḥ kenacidavijñānamajñānamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:139_0: 16. apratibhā / yadi parasya pratijñāṃ nyāyavadīkṣate dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastadāpratibhā /
SA15bsa069_u:140_1: kasmāt? / yadi kaścidarthaṃ na vijānāti dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastena saha vādo na kartavya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:141_1: anyeṣu nigrahasthāneṣu, sadoṣasya vacanasya vividhenopāyenoddharaṇaṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa069_u:142_0: 17. vikṣepaḥ / svapratijñāyā doṣaṃ jñātvā vyājaiḥ parihāraḥ kāryāntarakathanam /
SA15bsa069_u:142_1: yathāhaṃ svayaṃ rogī, ahaṃ paraṃ roginaṃ draṣṭumicchāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:142_2: tadā tu yadi nāpakrāmati paradūṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ na kalpayati /
SA15bsa069_u:143_2: svapakṣadoṣamanujānāti, yathā mama doṣa evaṃ bhavato 'pītyabhyupagacchan /
SA15bsa069_u:144_2: tadarthe ca hīne kiṃ prayojanaṃ dūṣaṇena /
SA15bsa069_u:146_0: 21. apasiddhāntaḥ / pūrvaṃ caturvidhe siddhānte svayamaṅgīkṛte 'pi paścāccedyathāsiddhāntaṃ na brūyādayamapasiddhāntaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:147_0: 22. hetvābhāsāḥ / yathā pūrvamuktāstrividhāḥ / asiddho 'neikāntiko viruddhaśceti hetvābhāsāḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:149_1: kasmāt / śṛṅgadarśanāt / yaḥ saśṛṅga sa gaurityanaikāntikaḥ chāgarurvādīnāṃ saśṛṅgatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:150_1: kasmāt / aruṇodayāt / aruṇodayo rātryā viruddhaḥ / aruṇodayahetū rātristhāpanāsamarthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:150_2: yadi kenacideṣa hetuḥ prayujyate tadā hetvābhāsanigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
